entry.title: New Year Changes
entry.content:
Happy New Year!

I’ve decided to start the new year with a cleaner “blog.” Last month I merged the Blog and Projects page. I’ve decided to focus on projects instead of blogging here. Jekyll and Github pages aren’t my top choice for frequent blogging. For that I think I would go back to WP.

entry.title: Website Desktop V2
entry.content: I designed this site to be best for mobile devices, but it looks pretty bland on larger screen. I’m thinking about adding some kind of sidebar. I’ve seen some dev sites with a 100vh sidebar. I like the look of that, but I’m not sure how it’d work with what I already have.
entry.summary: I designed this site to be best for mobile devices, but it looks pretty bland on larger screen. I’m thinking about adding some kind of sidebar. I’ve seen some dev sites with a 100vh sidebar. I like the look of that, but I’m not sure how it’d work with what I already have.
